    The Art of Zhanna Pekelis - Watercolor and Crochet - June 3 - August 31 2025

    The Art of Zhanna Pekelis - Watercolor and Crochet - June 3 - August 31 2025

    ABOUT THE EXHIBIT:
    Inspired by the natural world and the subtle interplay of light and shadow, her recent work focuses on birds and flowers—subjects she finds both beautiful and challenging. She also enjoys crocheting whimsical amigurumi toys,
    VIEW EXHIBIT
